amlInterruptTitle: Your company must be registered with an AML supervisory body
text1: To confirm your anti-money laundering (AML) registration, we need to check the name of your company is the same as the one your supervisory body holds.
text2: If the AML registration is in your name, the details will not match and we will reject your application.
text3: To register your company as an authorised agent, you'll need to
link1: register the company with an AML supervisory body
text4: Or, to register yourself as an authorised agent, you can
